评论详情: Although warm and comfortable the animals were not as visually pleasing... my daughter said and I quote her... they look like they say oink and not grrrr... they fit the color she desired the knitted bears not as much. First bust in a while.
Super cute and very cozy socks
These are just too thin for me, but they are super cute.

These are the cutest pair of socks that I own by far. They wash wonderfully and wear very well. I wear a size nine in women and they aren’t too tight and keep my feet warm. The bears especially look so cute when peaking out over my boots. Not too slippery on the bottoms. 100% plan to buy again in the future.
looks exactly like the picture. very comfortable and adorable.
These socks have the cutest patterns and are not too thick or thin. They are very comfortable and have a good amount of stretch. They are a good quality and wash and dry well. It's a great set.
So cute, arrived earlier than expected.

These socks are soo cute. They are perfect for fall outfits. One thing though, you can feel the design on some of the socks. All I do is just don't wear those socks with high top shoes; which why would you do anyway because it covers the design!

I got these as a late Christmas gift a while ago, and I love them! At first, I was worried they would be too thin and not hold up well in the wash. Wrong! They are so cute and high quality. I get a lot of compliments when I wear them, and I love the little decals on the ankles. Very cute!
super cute socks my gf loved them

These are definitely one of my favorite packs of socks I've ever bought. They're comfy and super cute. They also fit me perfectly. I have to dress professionally for my job and these are a great way to add personality to my outfits. Highly recommend!

They felt soft and breathable and the bears were absolutely adorable! I bought them as a gift for a bear enthusiast and she loves them! They definitely turned out to be way better than I was expecting and I'm kinda considering getting some for myself because of how cute they are lol

I was very excited about these until they came into the mail and I felt how thin they are. They are so thin! No comfort and no coziness. It was a complete let down from what I was expecting. I wish I would’ve returned
Obsessed with these cute socks for fall. They look adorable with my Uggs.
